Posts.Content: Sep 13, 2013 08:30PM andreardr wrote: Hi, this is Andrea Rader at Komen.  This thread popped up in my Google alerts (I'm not lurking), so I thought I would send a link to a fact sheet on Komen research and metastatic disease.  This also includes information about our outreach outside of research.  Here's the specific link to our metastatic information:  http://ww5.komen.org/uploadedFiles/Content/ResearchGrants/Metastasis04162013.pdf I hope this is helpful. -Andrea
Posts.Title: Anyone have a good anti-Komen op ed letter? Iwillwinthisbattle chanah
